gobblin.runtime.cli

Class ConstructorAndPublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.cli.PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
      • gobblin.runtime.cli.ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<EmbeddedGobblin>
        • gobblin.runtime.cli.ConstructorAndPublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CliObjectFactory<EmbeddedGobblin>, EmbeddedGobblinCliFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmbeddedGobblin.CliFactory

    public abstract class ConstructorAndPublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory
extends ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<EmbeddedGobblin>
implements EmbeddedGobblinCliFactory
    A helper class for automatically inferring Options from the constructor and public methods in a class. For method inference, see PublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory. Options are inferred from the constructor as follows: 1. The helper will search for exactly one constructor with only String arguments and which is annotated with CliObjectSupport. 2. For each parameter of the constructor, the helper will create a required Option. For an example usage see EmbeddedGobblin.CliFactory.
